title: Heavenly Rest
verses:
There is an hour of peaceful rest, To mourning wander'rs giv'n;
There is a soft, a downy bed, As fair as breath of ev'n;

A couch for wea-ry mor-tals spread, Where they may rest the ach-ing head,
And find re-pose in heaven.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Emphasizes the hope of heavenly rest and peace for believers
